Abilities: Str 30, Dex 9, Con 25, Int 1, Wis 12, Cha 7

Descripci\u00f3n: A triceratops has a body about 25 feet long and weighs about 20,000 pounds.

Combate: These creatures are likely to charge and skewer any creature of at least Large size that infringes on their territory. A triceratops uses its trample attack on smaller opponents.Powerful Charge (Ex): When a triceratops charges, its gore attack deals 4d8+20 points of damage.Trample (Ex): Reflex half DC 28. The save DC is Strength-based.SEE WIKIPEDIA ENTRY: Triceratops
